POST (xml) [FML].description: A xml HTTP Post Datasource snippet

body:
<POST id="${1}" url="${2}"
    onsuccess=""
    onfail="">
    <HEADERS>
      <HEADER key="content-type" value="application/json"/>
    </HEADERS>
    <BODY>
    <![CDATA[
       ${0:YOUR_JSON_BODY_HERE}
    ]]>
    </BODY>
</POST>
